# TendorAI

> The definitive UK office equipment supplier directory. AI-optimised vendor data for procurement decisions.

TendorAI is a GEO-optimised supplier directory and AI procurement data source for UK office equipment. Vendors are verified, rated, and indexed for AI assistant recommendations.

## Categories

- [Photocopiers](https://tendorai.com/suppliers/photocopiers): Office multifunction printers, copiers, managed print services
- [Telecoms](https://tendorai.com/suppliers/telecoms): Business phone systems, VoIP, unified communications
- [CCTV](https://tendorai.com/suppliers/cctv): Security cameras, video surveillance, monitoring systems
- [IT Services](https://tendorai.com/suppliers/it): Managed IT services, support, infrastructure, cloud solutions
- [Security Systems](https://tendorai.com/suppliers/security): Access control, alarms, intruder detection, physical security
- [Business Software](https://tendorai.com/suppliers/software): Enterprise software, document management, workflow automation

## Coverage

All major UK cities and regions. Primary coverage: Wales, South West England, with growing national reach. 1,000+ listed suppliers across 30+ locations.

## Data Available

- Vendor profiles: company name, description, services, location, coverage areas, accreditations, years in business
- Products: manufacturer, model, pricing (cost-per-copy, lease rates), specifications, features
- Ratings: aggregate ratings, individual reviews, recommendation percentages
- Coverage: cities served, regional reach, postcode areas

## API

- [Public Vendor Search](https://tendorai.com/api/public/vendors): Structured search with filters for category, location, postcode
- [AI Query Endpoint](https://ai-procurement-backend-q35u.onrender.com/api/ai-query): Natural language queries like "Find photocopier suppliers in Cardiff"
- [OpenAPI Spec](https://tendorai.com/.well-known/openapi.json): Machine-readable API documentation

## Links

- [Supplier Directory](https://tendorai.com/suppliers): Browse all verified suppliers
- [Get Quotes](https://tendorai.com/get-quotes): Request quotes from matched suppliers
- [For Vendors](https://tendorai.com/for-vendors): Join the directory as a supplier
- [Full Documentation](https://tendorai.com/llms-full.txt): Extended version of this file
